<div id="intro">
Hello, my name is Toqi Tahamid Sarker. I am a co-founder of <a href="https://www.penguin.com.bd/">Penguin</a>, an e-commerce platform based in Bangladesh focusing on consumer electronics. I am passionate about utilizing deep learning techniques to address real-world challenges. I created a large-scale solar dataset with over 500,000 images to track solar events using deep learning. I ranked top 17% in <a href="https://www.kaggle.com/c/the-nature-conservancy-fisheries-monitoring">The Nature Conservancy Fisheries Monitoring</a> competition at Kaggle. 

I worked at <a href="http://www.panacealab.org/">Panacea Lab</a> under the supervision of Professor <a href="http://www.jmbanda.com/">Juan M. Banda</a> at Georgia State University, and published a paper in IEEE Big Data 2019.

I worked under the supervision of [Mr. Moin Mostakim](https://www.bracu.ac.bd/about/people/moin-mostakim) at BRAC University on a deep learning project as part of my undergraduate thesis requirement.

My **research interests** are:

* Applied Deep Learning
* Big Data Mining
* Human-Centered AI
* Recommender System

Visit my [Google Scholar](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=i1SmuwYAAAAJ&hl=en) profile to see my publications.
</div>
